episodes.title: Our Souls and the Soil (ft. Jennifer Galardi)
episodes.description: This week on Moment of Truth, Nick is joined by Jennifer Galardi, Senior Policy Analyst at the Heritage Foundation’s Restoring American Wellness initiative. Jennifer shares her riveting journey from a progressive LA lifestyle to leading the Make America Healthy Again (MAHA) movement. Life has led her through many twists and turns, including time spent in a yoga cult before rediscovering Christianity and diving into health policy. Now she exposes the dangers of fast consumerism, GMOs, and a broken healthcare system. Dive into discussions on regenerative farming, the pitfalls of Big Ag, and the cultural shift needed to combat obesity and chronic disease. Jennifer’s insights on Ozempic, food dyes, and the spiritual crisis facing America are both compelling and urgent. Don’t miss this powerful call to reclaim wellness!
